Windows Exporter is an integration used to monitor Windows instances

1.  ## Choose your OS
    
    Select your OS
    
    Windows - based
    
2.  ## Download the Windows Grafana Agent Installer
    
     The default scrape interval is 60s
    
    [Grafana Agent Windows Installer](https://github.com/grafana/agent/releases/latest/download/grafana-agent-installer.exe)

Optional Configuration

Optional configurations

integrations:
  windows_exporter:
    enabled: true

![clipboard icon](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

For a full description of configuration options, see [`windows_exporter_config`](https://grafana.com/docs/agent/latest/configuration/integrations/windows-exporter-config/) in the Grafana Agent documentation.

After installation, the Agent config is stored in C:\Program Files\Grafana Agent\agent-config.yaml. Anytime the config file is modified, run the following to restart the Agent so it can pick up changes:

sc stop "Grafana Agent" 
sc start "Grafana Agent"

![clipboard icon](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Checking connection. It might take up to a minute...

Test integration and finish installationGo back
